item.title: Simple git tutorial
item.description: This is pretty simple tutorial for update gitlab or github. So I wonâ€™t tell you how GIT work. If you want to learn rigorous and precise. This web way help:https://gitbook.tw/. Step 1: Build a git place and push on it. 1-1: You have to build a Repository or a Project on gitlab(or github) 1-2: Make sure you have installed the GIT on your device. Then open the commander
